EmailTemplate.name: NavDB Team
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject} : {!Case.CaseNumber} {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name};
Thank you for your recent inquiry to the Honeywell Aerospace Pilot’s Corner. We appreciate your interest in our services.
Your request has been forwarded to our Navigation Database Team and you should receive a response within 24 hours or the next business day.
Your satisfaction is important to us. If you have any questions or concerns, please reply to this email.
Sincerely,
The Pilot’s Corner Team
